ygData.subject: Re: twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/16/99 3:42:16 PM EST, omega8@mindspring.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/16/99 3:42:16 PM EST, omega8@... writes:

<< So I guess, what I am saying, here and in a couple other posts, is... This
game is as fun as you want it to be. If you dont have fun unless you're
"safe"... well... I feel for you. If you dont have fun with anything but
bashing NPC skulls well... I guess I feel for you too. But you can find
your sort of fun in EQ, same as the rest of us. I just wish you'd quit
bitching about the rest of us getting to have OUR fun too.

(generalized you there, please dont take it personally.) >>


whoa! way outta left field there don't ya think? If you contstrued any of my
comments as "bitching" please don't respond to them. Bitching wasn't what i
intended , and it isn't what i did. As far as only being safe , that isn't
what I like , i was simply stating my view that exploring and hunting can be
easier said than done. And where you dug up any of those ideas about me
bashing skulls , or harping on your fun . I just don't have a clue. On an
equally related note , i never asked you to feel for me , nor would i ever
want you to.

And yes i did take that personally , and putting something like that at the
end of such comments is utter bull. You had an intelligent post up until the
end, therefore an intelligent person will know how someone will take it,
regardless of the footnote.


Ulaien yada yada yada
